item.title: AI Integrations
item.description: Empower Your Team with Specialized Azure Training Programs As AI becomes increasingly integral to business operations, organizations must ensure their teams have the right skills to harness its potential. At AI SYSTEMS TODAY, we offer comprehensive Azure training programs designed to help teams master data science, data engineering, AI engineering, and more. Azure Training Programs # AI Fundamentals (AI-900) Certification: AI-900 Course Content Highlights: Fundamentals of AI and Machine Learning Overview of Azure Cognitive Services Implementing Simple AI Models Duration: 4 Days Price: Free Data Analysis (PL-300) Certification: PL-300 Course Content Highlights: Fundamentals of Power BI and Data Visualization Designing Data Models Advanced Analytics with R and Python Data Transformation and DAX Duration: 4 Days Price: $1,800 Data Scientist (DP-100) Certification: DP-100 Course Content Highlights: Introduction to Azure Machine Learning Data Preparation and Feature Engineering Hyperparameter Tuning and Model Management Deploying Models with Azure ML Endpoints Duration: 4 Days Price: $2,000 Data Engineer (DP-300) Certification: DP-300 Course Content Highlights: Designing and Implementing Data Storage Solutions Data Integration and ETL with Azure Data Factory Managing Data Security and Compliance High Availability and Disaster Recovery Duration: 4 Days Price: $2,000 AI Engineer (AI-100) Certification: AI-100 Course Content Highlights: Implementing Natural Language Processing Solutions Building Computer Vision Models with Azure Developing Conversational AI with Azure Bot Service Integrating AI Models into Applications Duration: 4 Days Price: $1,900 Developer (AZ-200) Certification: AZ-200 Course Content Highlights: Introduction to Azure Cloud Architecture Developing and Deploying Web Apps Implementing Azure Functions and Logic Apps Monitoring and Troubleshooting Applications Duration: 4 Days Price: $1,900 DevOps (AZ-400) Certification: AZ-400 Course Content Highlights: Developing CI/CD Pipelines with Azure DevOps Managing Infrastructure as Code with Terraform Monitoring and Logging for DevOps Solutions Security and Compliance in DevOps Duration: 4 Days Price: $2,100 How to Get Started # Ready to empower your team with Azure training programs?
